flow.name: db:/ingest

db:select.db:dynamic-query: SELECT sips.local_id, sips.md5, sips.organisation, sips.organisation_id, sips.filename, sips.archive_status, sips.pid, sips.comment, sips.last_event_date, sips.preingest_status, count(*) OVER() AS full_count FROM sips sips WHERE sips.organisation_id LIKE #["'" + flowVars.organisation_id + "'"] AND (#[flowVars.authorised_organisations[0] == "OR-*"] OR sips.organisation_id IN(#["'" +org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils.join(flowVars.authorised_organisations, "','") + "'"])) AND local_id LIKE #["'" + flowVars.local_id + "'"] AND md5 LIKE #["'" + flowVars.md5 + "'"] AND organisation LIKE #["'" + flowVars.organisation + "'"] AND organisation_id LIKE #["'" + flowVars.organisation_id + "'"] AND filename LIKE #["'" + flowVars.filename + "'"] AND archive_status LIKE #["'" + flowVars.archive_status + "'"] AND pid LIKE #["'" + flowVars.pid + "'"] AND comment LIKE #["'" + flowVars.comment + "'"] AND preingest_status LIKE #["'" + flowVars.preingest_status + "'"] AND sips.last_event_date >= #["'" + flowVars.from + "'"] AND sips.last_event_date < #["'" + flowVars.until + "'"] ORDER BY sips.last_event_date DESC OFFSET #[flowVars.startIndex] LIMIT #[flowVars.nrOfResults];

flow.name: db:/ingest/{id}

db:select.db:dynamic-query: SELECT * FROM events WHERE (local_id = #["'" + flowVars.id + "'"] OR local_id IN(SELECT local_id FROM events WHERE pid = #["'" + flowVars.id + "'"])) AND organisation_id LIKE #["'" + flowVars.organisation_id + "'"] AND (#[flowVars.authorised_organisations[0] == "OR-*"] OR organisation_id IN(#["'" +org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils.join(flowVars.authorised_organisations, "','") + "'"])) ORDER BY date DESC;
